description:
Tsuna receives the Vongola Box from Irie. However, Irie shockingly tells him that in order to draw out the true power of the Vongola Rings and open the Vongola Box, the Seven Arcobaleno Seals are needed. In order to obtain the seals, Tsuna needs to overcome the Arcobaleno trials. However, in the future all of the Arcobaleno, besides Reborn, are dead. Tsuna doesn’t know what to do. Irie says that he`ll momentarily send Tsuna and his friends into the past so that they can retrieve the seals.
Source: crunchyroll
